Dental Intelligence Reseller Partner Program

We pride ourselves on helping intelligently shape the future of dentistry, and we couldn’t do that without our valued partner relationships. Together, we can better the lives of dentists, team members, and patients. Visit our Reseller Program tab to learn more. We appreciate your partnership.

Reseller Program

Our Reseller Program provides opportunities to partner with a trusted company in the dental space to propel your brand and growth goals, increase the value of your services, help your clients with data-backed insights, and unlock exclusive discounts and training for your team and the practices you serve. We offer three different tiers in our Reseller Program so you can choose the partnership that makes the most sense for your business.

All Tiers Include:

  • Preferred Reseller Pricing
  • Annual Growth Reports
  • Premium Support (chat, email, phone)
  • In-App Product Training
  • On-Demand Learning
  • Online Help Center
  • DI Community Access
  • Early Access Monthly Newsletter
  • Swag Box
  • Quarterly Partner Training Webinar
  • Client Snapshots

Best for coaches, consultants, and marketing companies who understand the Dental Intelligence modules and are looking to expand services and reach the new tier minimums in order to receive discounted pricing and gain additional perks.

Best for coaches, consultants, and marketing companies who understand the Dental Intelligence modules can activate clients and are looking to expand services to meet gold tier discounts and gain additional perks.

Best for coaches, consultants, and marketing companies who understand the Dental Intelligence modules can activate clients and are looking to expand services to meet diamond-tier discounts and gain additional perks.

Silver Perks

Includes all general perks, PLUS

  • Guest Opportunity on Growth in Dentistry Podcast
  • Quarterly Business Review*
  • Premium Intellicon Pricing
  • Access to Partner Product Focus Group
  • Access to Partner Success Manager

*For $5k+ monthly

Gold Perks

Includes all general and silver tier perks, PLUS

  • Quarterly Business Review
  • Dedicated Partner Success Manager
  • Featured on DI Website as a Certified Partner

Diamond Perks

Includes all general, silver, and gold tier perks, PLUS

  • Host an Intellicon Breakout Session
  • DI Executive Sponsor
  • Annual Co-Branded Partner Case Study
  • Participation in Sponsored Events

  • Snapshot

  • License Activation

  • Partner Bundle

  • License Cancellation

Resources

Partner Training Toolkit

Streamline your Dental Intelligence journey with our Partner Training Toolkit. Whether you're a new DI partner or simply seeking a refresherr course, this toolkit offers comprehensive guidance to acquaint yourself with our software and highlights recommended features to optimize your experience.

Go to Toolkit

Knowledge Base

Browse our robust knowledge base to find answers to common questions and learn more about all the features Dental Intelligence has to offer. Articles and videos are searchable by keyword to help you quickly locate the content you need.

Go to Knowledge Base

Premium Support

Partners have access to our premium support channels to help provide your customers with a white-glove experience. Our premium support hours are Monday-Friday, 6am-3pm MST. You can reach premium support at premiumsupport@dentalintel.com, or you can start a live chat below.

Start a live chat

Podcast Guest Request Form

Silver, Gold, and Diamond tier partners have the opportunity to be featured on the Dental Intelligence Growth in Dentistry podcast hosted by Steve Jensen. If you would like to be on the podcast, please fill out the form below and our marketing team will be in touch to get you scheduled.

Submit request
